title: GroupCalender  WoW Addon
description:
Group Calendar 4 is now in beta testing and should be done within a few weeks. I&#039;m very pleased so far with this release as it addresses many longstanding bugs and features which GC has been sorely needing for a while now. If you decide to help test then wonderful, but keep in mind a few important points:

    * You must exit WoW completely to upgrade to the 4.0 alpha/beta. Upgrading using only a reloadui will cause you pain and misery.
    * You WILL experience bugs, maybe even some bad ones. I promise you will. If for some reason you don&#039;t experience bugs, then perhaps I have grossly underestimated my abilities. But you&#039;ll find bugs, don&#039;t worry.
    * GC4 and GC3 will not talk to each other
    * Events created under GC4 will show up for GC3 users once you downgrade back to GC3
    * The databases are compatible and you can freely switch between GC3 and GC4 during the alpha/beta phase
    * When discussing GC4 features here in the Comments, please make it clear that you are referring to the alpha/beta version to avoid confusing regular users and to avoid confusing me as well
    * Do not file bug reports or crash logs in the Comments section as they take too much space. I&#039;ve enabled the ticket mechanism for Group Calendar here on Curse, please file tickets to report bugs and crash logs.
